In addition the .University should provide:
A first quality research center, utilizing the resources of
specialists in many disciplines. The research facilities should be
available to all potential users, including government, educational,
V
industry and citizen agencies.
A workshop, conference and convention center, providing seminars
on the highest level to communications experts and administrators as
well as conference consultation and management to lay groups. This
would include international as'well as national meetings, festivals,
competitions and similar events.
A special training center for federal and state government
personnel, providing cohesive resources for Peace Corps, AID, agency
training directors, state education officials and others.
Consultant services to all potential users in all areas, such as
research for government, systems planning for states, conference
planning for foreign embassies, and public relations campaign planning
for citizen organizations.
